text: [Music]
you didn't fail you don't need to make
me feel better I'm not trying to make
you feel better I'm just telling you the
truth you didn't fail because we were
always playing on borrowed time Mike
Harvey I wouldn't have any of this
without you I think it's time I got your
exposure you don't have to do that it's
all gonna come crashing down anyway
I'm gonna go to Louis I'm gonna resign
and I'm gonna beg him to let this whole
thing go and I'm going with you
Harvey when Trevor went to Jessica with
my secret I felt betrayed
I lost my closest friend in the world
and I know you don't like to admit it
but we're friends I'm not gonna betray
my friend
[Music]
[Laughter]
[Music]
I used to hate this kind of thing what
kind of thing guest lectures hard we
used to make us sit through them except
you gave tests afterwards yeah and if
you didn't pass you got stuck on duck
review goddamn harmony do you remember
the Robinson case sure do
eighty thousand documents two years of
prep five months in court and the Friday
before trial started he assigned you and
I to prove everything you blew it off
you covered for me you did your half and
mine and Turnitin would have fired you
on the spot
exactly I'm here because you didn't sell
out a friend and but you're about to now
Mike me friend Louis I may not ever say
it but that's not because we aren't we
are you know it I know it I just don't
like to say it last time I asked you
said don't push it you knew I meant yes
I did
so Mike told you you did it what do you
say it doesn't matter bottom line is I
forgave him because I don't care what
some stupid piece of paper says and I
want you to forgive him too Oh Harvey I
did forgive him
I just can't cover it up for him you
covered it up with Hardman for me what
you did that weekend is not the same as
what he did to Professor Gerard what's
the same as Hardman wouldn't have let it
go and Gerard won't let it go
you make Mike confess he might as well
throw his life down the toilet Harvey he
didn't just betray us he betrayed the
law he did that's not right
it isn't but forgiveness isn't about
right and wrong Louis I know you value
the letter of the law but what about its
spirit because Mike embodies that spirit
more than either one of us you said
we're friends friend would not ask me to
do this no Louis friend just won't hold
it against you if you don't
